verses.verse: But Job <S%H347><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Oh that <S%H3863><s%> my grief <S%H3708><s%> were throughly weighed, <S%H8254><s%> <S%H8254><s%> and my calamity <S%H1942><s%> laid <S%H5375><s%> in the balances <S%H3976><s%> together! <S%H3162><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> it would be heavier <S%H3513><s%> than the sand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2344><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%> therefore <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3651><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> are swallowed up. <S%H3886><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> the arrows <S%H2671><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> are within <S%H5978><s%> me, the poison <S%H2534><s%> whereof <S%H834><s%> drinketh up <S%H8354><s%> my spirit: <S%H7307><s%> the terrors <S%H1161><s%> of God <S%H433><s%> do set themselves in array against <S%H6186><s%> me.
Doth the wild ass <S%H6501><s%> bray <S%H5101><s%> when he hath grass? <S%H1877><s%> or <S%H518><s%> loweth <S%H1600><s%> the ox <S%H7794><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> his fodder? <S%H1098><s%>

Can that which is unsavory <S%H8602><s%> be eaten <S%H398><s%> without <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1097><s%> salt? <S%H4417><s%> or <S%H518><s%> is there <S%H3426><s%> any taste <S%H2940><s%> in the white <S%H7388><s%> of an egg? <S%H2495><s%>
The things <S%H1992><s%> that my soul <S%H5315><s%> refused <S%H3985><s%> to touch <S%H5060><s%> are as my sorrowful <S%H1741><s%> meat. <S%H3899><s%>
Oh that <S%H4310><s%> I might <S%H5414><s%> have <S%H935><s%> my request; <S%H7596><s%> and that God <S%H433><s%> would grant <S%H5414><s%> me the thing that I long for! <S%H8615><s%>
Even that it would please <S%H2974><s%> God <S%H433><s%> to destroy <S%H1792><s%> me; that he would let loose <S%H5425><s%> his hand, <S%H3027><s%> and cut me off! <S%H1214><s%>

Then should I yet <S%H5750><s%> have <S%H1961><s%> comfort; <S%H5165><s%> yea, I would harden <S%H5539><s%> myself in sorrow: <S%H2427><s%> let him not <S%H3808><s%> spare; <S%H2550><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I have not <S%H3808><s%> concealed <S%H3582><s%> the words <S%H561><s%> of the Holy One. <S%H6918><s%>

What <S%H4100><s%> is my strength, <S%H3581><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I should hope? <S%H3176><s%> and what <S%H4100><s%> is mine end, <S%H7093><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> I should prolong <S%H748><s%> my life? <S%H5315><s%>
Is my strength <S%H3581><s%> the strength <S%H3581><s%> of stones? <S%H68><s%> or is my flesh <S%H1320><s%> of brass? <S%H5153><s%>
Is not <S%H369><s%> my help <S%H5833><s%> in me? and is wisdom <S%H8454><s%> driven <S%H5080><s%> quite from <S%H4480><s%> me?

To him that is afflicted <S%H4523><s%> pity <S%H2617><s%> should be showed from his friend; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7453><s%> but he forsaketh <S%H5800><s%> the fear <S%H3374><s%> of the Almighty. <S%H7706><s%>
My brethren <S%H251><s%> have dealt deceitfully <S%H898><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> a brook, <S%H5158><s%> and as the stream <S%H650><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> they pass away; <S%H5674><s%>
Which are blackish <S%H6937><s%> by reason of <S%H4480><s%> the ice, <S%H7140><s%> and wherein <S%H5921><s%> the snow <S%H7950><s%> is hid: <S%H5956><s%>
What time <S%H6256><s%> they wax warm, <S%H2215><s%> they vanish: <S%H6789><s%> when it is hot, <S%H2522><s%> they are consumed <S%H1846><s%> out of their place. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4725><s%>
The paths <S%H734><s%> of their way <S%H1870><s%> are turned aside; <S%H3943><s%> they go <S%H5927><s%> to nothing, <S%H8414><s%> and perish. <S%H6><s%>
The troops <S%H734><s%> of Tema <S%H8485><s%> looked, <S%H5027><s%> the companies <S%H1979><s%> of Sheba <S%H7614><s%> waited <S%H6960><s%> for <S%H3926><s%> them.
They were confounded <S%H954><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they had hoped; <S%H982><s%> they came <S%H935><s%> thither, <S%H5704><s%> and were ashamed. <S%H2659><s%>
For <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> ye are <S%H1961><s%> nothing; <S%H3808><s%> ye see <S%H7200><s%> my casting down, <S%H2866><s%> and are afraid. <S%H3372><s%>
Did <S%H3588><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> Bring <S%H3051><s%> unto me? or, Give a reward <S%H7809><s%> for <S%H1157><s%> me of your substance? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3581><s%>
Or, Deliver <S%H4422><s%> me from the enemy's hand? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> <S%H6862><s%> or, Redeem <S%H6299><s%> me from the hand <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the mighty? <S%H6184><s%>
Teach <S%H3384><s%> me, and I <S%H589><s%> will hold my tongue: <S%H2790><s%> and cause me to understand <S%H995><s%> wherein <S%H4100><s%> I have erred. <S%H7686><s%>
How <S%H4100><s%> forcible <S%H4834><s%> are right <S%H3476><s%> words! <S%H561><s%> but what <S%H4100><s%> doth your arguing <S%H3198><s%> reprove? <S%H3198><s%> <S%H4480><s%>
Do ye imagine <S%H2803><s%> to reprove <S%H3198><s%> words, <S%H4405><s%> and the speeches <S%H561><s%> of one that is desperate, <S%H2976><s%> which are as wind? <S%H7307><s%>
Yea, <S%H637><s%> ye overwhelm <S%H5307><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the fatherless, <S%H3490><s%> and ye dig <S%H3738><s%> a pit for <S%H5921><s%> your friend. <S%H7453><s%>
Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore be content, <S%H2974><s%> look <S%H6437><s%> upon me; for it is evident unto <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you if <S%H518><s%> I lie. <S%H3576><s%>

Return, <S%H7725><s%> I pray you, <S%H4994><s%> let it not <S%H408><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> iniquity; <S%H5766><s%> yea, return <S%H7725><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> my righteousness <S%H6664><s%> is in it.
Is there <S%H3426><s%> iniquity <S%H5766><s%> in my tongue? <S%H3956><s%> cannot <S%H3808><s%> my taste <S%H2441><s%> discern <S%H995><s%> perverse things? <S%H1942><s%>
